mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id AS reservationId, s.shop_name AS shopName, p.procedure_name AS procedureName, d.designer_name AS designerName, r.start_time AS reservationTime, r.status, d.designer_id AS designerId, p.procedure_price AS price FROM reservation r JOIN shop s ON r.shop_id = s.shop_id JOIN `procedure` p ON r.procedure_id = p.procedure_id LEFT JOIN designer d ON r.designer_id = d.designer_id WHERE r.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY r.start_time DESC
